tasks.title: Wireframing
tasks.description: Create low-fidelity designs that outline the basic structure and layout of the product or service.

tasks.title: First design concept
tasks.description: Create a concept based on the research and insights gathered during the discovery phase of the project.

tasks.title: Design library
tasks.description: Create a collection of reusable design elements, such as buttons, forms, and navigation menus.

tasks.title: Customer Journey Mapping
tasks.description: Identify the key touchpoints and pain points in the user's journey through the product to improve the overall customer.

tasks.title: Persona development
tasks.description: Create user personas based on the research data to represent different user groups and their characteristics, goals, and behaviors.

tasks.title: Competitor research
tasks.description: Research competitors particularly weakness and strengths in their UX/UI. Focus on comparing their product features, quality.

tasks.title: Branding, visual identity
tasks.description: Create a brand identity that includes the logo, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines.

tasks.title: Marketing materials
tasks.description: Create a branded materials such as business cards, flyers, brochures, and social media assets.
